It is native to southern Africa, particularly South Africa, where it thrives in rocky, well-drained soils. The plant is characterized by its compact, low-growing habit and its distinctive, fleshy, blue-green leaves. Cryptanthus reptans is well adapted to arid environments and requires minimal water once established.
